p:
Palm kernel oil (PKO) is the oil extracted from the seeds of oil palm ( Elaeis guineensis Jackqu), also known as palm kernels (PK)
1 . Being one of the main vegetable oils, it is widely applied in food areas, whereby the aroma is a concern that affects its utilization directly
2 . The aroma of PKO is thought to be majorly formed during the roasting process, upon which thermal reactions such as Maillard reaction and caramelization occur
3, 4 .
